A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a very off-putting movie.
It doesn't quite feel like a Star Wars movie\, but it's still fun to watch.
I enjoyed the dynamic between Kylo Ren and Rey\, however Lukes story missed the mark pretty bad.
I've seen the movie three time already\, and it just leaves a funny taste in my mouth each time.
My overall thoughts of episode 8 is that it's the best out of the bad Star Wars movies. It still beast the crap out 'Attack of the Clones'.
